text: Custer County is a county in U.S. state of Idaho. In the 2020 census, the population was 4,249. The county seat is Challis. ==Communities== ===Cities=== *Challis *Clayton *Lost River *Mackay *Stanley ===Unincorporated communities=== * Ellis * Goldburg ===Ghost towns=== * Bayhorse * Bonanza * Custer ==References== ==Other websites== * *Challis School District #181 Category:1881 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in Idaho Territory
title: Custer County, Idaho
